actionTemplate.title: 3-shade gradient blush for oval faces
steps: Apply “atmosphere” blush as a light wash across the cheek area
Place “plumping” blush slightly forward on the cheeks
Add a small amount of “contracting” blush on outer cheekbone for depth
Blend into a smooth gradient with no hard borders
Tap a tiny bit above the upper lip and on the nose tip to shorten and sweeten

rationaleTemplate: Gradients add dimension on balanced face shapes
Small accents on philtrum and nose tip create a youthful vibe
